Html:
Good Day,

I have strange but in many project "interesting" request. Maybe you can show me direction how done it. We have many markers on map. Some of them time to time have relation between each other. This relation internal for buisness process of project. So request is very simple - draw line between related markers on some event (move over, checkbox enabled, etc.).

I understood that I can handle event, and manualy draw line, but maybe present some native way.
make a route with two coordinates of related markers
route present all time, and I need shw it only per some "event". Also markers linked not all time and move :)
you can hide it when you do not need to show it, once markers move, update coordinates of the route

Any way to change "beautiful" pen for route? or need create custom

CreateRoutePath

RegenerateRouteShape
